sentences.en: A basketball player is allowed five personal fouls before fouling out.
sentences.cn: 篮球运动员侵人犯规五次即被罚下场.

sentences.en: Basketball is his consuming passion .
sentences.cn: 篮球令他着迷。

sentences.en: Do you like basketball?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢篮球吗？

sentences.en: He is giving the commentary on the basketball game.
sentences.cn: 他正在对篮球赛作评论.

sentences.en: He took his basketball away from me.
sentences.cn: 他从我这儿把他的篮球拿走了。

sentences.en: His injury incapacitated him for playing basketball.
sentences.cn: 他因受伤而不能打篮球了。

sentences.en: I used to play basketball.
sentences.cn: 我过去常打篮球。

sentences.en: I was hot on playing basketball when I was in college.
sentences.cn: 我上大学时热衷于打篮球.

sentences.en: I wonder who will play in the basketball match.
sentences.cn: 我不知道这场篮球赛谁会上场.

sentences.en: Jeff played intramural basketball in high school.
sentences.cn: 杰夫在中学时参加了校内篮球赛。

sentences.en: Neither volleyball nor basketball is a hundred years old.
sentences.cn: 排球和篮球都不到一百年的历史.

sentences.en: Shaun McCalister also played for the varsity basketball team.
sentences.cn: 肖恩·麦卡利斯特也为校篮球队效过力。

sentences.en: the National Basketball Association Championship
sentences.cn: NBA大赛

sentences.en: the world basketball champions
sentences.cn: 世界篮球冠军

sentences.en: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.cn: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

sentences.en: to play basketball in the gym
sentences.cn: 在体育馆打篮球

sentences.en: Valerie earned letters in three sports: volleyball, basketball, and field hockey.
sentences.cn: 瓦莱丽在排球、篮球和曲棍球三个项目上获得了佩戴校名首字母标志的荣誉。

sentences.en: We love playing basketball.
sentences.cn: 我们爱打篮球。

sentences.en: Whoever heard of a basketball player who doesn't need to jump?
sentences.cn: 有谁听说过篮球运动员不需要跳跃的吗？

sentences.en: Why did you choose basketball in the first place?
sentences.cn: 你为何首先选择篮球 呢 ?

sentences.en: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.cn: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 篮球选手；篮球球员

trans.tran_en: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net
a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net
